response_text: I strongly support the proposal to improve healthcare access in rural areas. The current system fails many communities.
The funding is clearly insufficient. We need at least 50% more budget allocation for this initiative.
I disagree with the approach taken. Alternative energy solutions would be more cost-effective.
This is a great step forward. The environmental impact assessment shows clear benefits.
I think the consultation process itself needs improvement. Many voices are being excluded.
Reducing waiting times at GP surgeries should be the top priority. I've waited 3 weeks for an appointment.
The proposed changes will disproportionately affect low-income families.
More investment in public transport would reduce carbon emissions significantly.
I welcome the digital transformation agenda but worry about those who lack internet access.
The policy lacks specific implementation details. How will this be enforced?
